feature.name: light-theme-conversion
feature.title: Change Theme from Dark to Light
feature.description: Update the Open Mazad application from dark theme to light theme by changing colors, backgrounds, and component styles

stories.title: Update global CSS colors
stories.description: Change the root CSS variables and body styles in globals.css from dark to light colors. Change bg-[#0a0a0a] to bg-white, text-white to text-gray-900.

stories.title: Update page.tsx hero section
stories.description: Replace dark background classes with light ones. Change bg-black, bg-gray-900 to bg-white, bg-gray-50. Change text-white to text-gray-900.

stories.title: Update card and component backgrounds
stories.description: Change glass-panel and card backgrounds from dark transparent to light transparent. Update border colors for light theme.
testSteps: Cards have light backgrounds with subtle shadows
Borders are visible on light background

stories.title: Update LightRays component for light theme
stories.description: Adjust LightRays colors to be visible and attractive on light background. May need darker or more saturated ray colors.
testSteps: LightRays effect is visible on light background
